message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll take the lead, you can't refuse!
Not so fast, Bob! I'm not giving up that much.
You took a big lead last round, now it's my turn to try and catch up!
You're trying to catch up, but I'm not letting you get close!
Not giving up yet, Bob! I'll try to make a better offer.
I'm getting desperate, Bob, but I'm still trying to hold on to what's left!
You're almost out of options, Alice. It's time to surrender!
I'm not done yet, Bob! I'll make one final offer.
This is my last stand, Bob. I'll take whatever I can get.
